page.title: 09SKIING IN ROSSENDALE
page.content: There are courses at Rossendale Ski Slope for beginners and for more advanced skiers with all instruction under the supervision of fully qualified ski instructors.All equiptment hire may be included in the cost of such courses and many local schools take advantage of such facilities. In addition to such courses and general public practice sessions the slope also caters for competitive meetings when the main slope is closed for public skiing. Both race meetings and freestyle competitions attract entrants from throughout the north of England. Stephen Horrocks is the top local skier. In July 1985 he is travelling to Austria for two weeks training, then he will carry on to Italy when he will represent Great Britain in the aerial competition.
